replies.body: Why does OCE not get hextech crafting, and if we are going to get it when should we expect it?
I think because of the AU gambling laws hextech crates fall under that

That's certainly not it. Britain's anti-gambling laws are even tighter than Australia's and plenty of shadier games (like Runescape) easily get away with offering gambling to children.

It's just a slow rollout, and this is unfortunately one of the ways OCE gets shafted, as it's seen as a "minor" region.

OCE is not being "shafted" by Hextech Crafting not being out yet. Crafting began testing in Turkey, and that testing expanded to NA. Every other region is waiting for the general release of Crafting.
It will release when it is ready, and when that happens OCE will be the first to receive it because we currently patch first.
The guy who posted appears to work for Riot, Have you no faith that where not an outcast server lol ?

You say it will release when its ready, but just this morning i read a post (over on eu i think) from i rioter about it being released for all other servers this patch. 

Mirross "We're planning to go this week, hopefully a day or so after this week's patch."
"Hopefully all regions, except Korea where we have some additional requirements"

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/4bc15v/hextech_crafting_in_eu/d1807bt

Yea, that includes OCE. If all goes to plan Crafting will release in the days following the patch, with OCE being first.

UPDATE: Seems not all went to plan. Crafting is still aimed to roll out soon but the schedule had to be pushed back. Expect it to come to OCE after it goes live in a couple of other regions in the next day or so.
Hextech Crafting was on the PBE, and now you guys need even more testng!

I'm not on the team developing Crafting, but I would assume that testing it on successively larger servers before final release would be a helpful way to receive and test feedback while testing the load that a whole new feature creates and adjust as necessary.
I dont think so because you're not aiming to make more money out of it, if that was the case csgo skins and betting wouldnt be allowed in AUS.
Ikr I've been waiting for weeks!
Riot doesn't care about this server. That's why we don't get normal draft, that's why it was okay to blatantly lie to us about getting a free skin.
Mate you do release they gave us pool party ziggs and ziggs for free, if the person did not own him.

Think Pool Paarty Ziggs was for Transfering to the Server Beta.

If you jsut joined after live you got squat.

Yes they did say that another free skin would be coming. No it didn't

Pool party Ziggs was not the free skin they promised, that was for early transfers.  Also, I did own him when I transferred. So we have this half-assed server that has Twisted Treeline only sometimes, and no unranked draft. I feel like we all got screwed transferring here and riot habitually lies to us. Now they said that we get every patch first but then we're gonna be late getting Hextech Crafting, too.
A whole patch later and still no hextech crafting. I swear OCE must be the {{champion:83}} server {{item:3151}} {{item:3070}}
Every region aside from TR and NA is awaiting the final release version of Crafting. When it is ready, OCE is scheduled to receive it first.
thanks and when you get a boxs with a key

One change that I think is long overdue is getting more bans in ranked.
6 bans when there were 40 champions was significant and strategic, 6 bans with 130 champions is almost pointless.
Maybe you should just learn to deal with them. Works for every single other person in the game, if not, they simply dont climb

Aurelion will be released some point today yeah? I got up sol early I can still see the stars and hope they align so that way I could purchase him so I can forge my path in the stars {{summoner:12}}
champs are never and have never been released on the day of a patch release so no, he won't be out today.
Actually champs always used to get released during patch with two skins aswell. it was only in season 3 when they stopped doing that.

this is why i prefer to put up with 350ms ping on EU server where they actually receive updates than play on my own countrys server with 40ms where we get shat on day in n day out with no unranked draft no twisted treeline no hextech basically a afterthought by riot = oceanic it seems like in the offices of riot they'd be like 'successful rollout guys! well done!' then someone would be like "what about oceanic?" followed by 'what is oceanic? can we nerf it?'
